sentence: The image is a collage of five advertisements for Adobe products and services.
sentence_cn: 该图片是五则 Adob​​e 产品和服务广告的拼贴画。

sentence: 1. Top Left: An advertisement with a scenic rocky coastline and the text "TAKE IT. MAKE IT."
sentence_cn: 1. 左上角：一则广告，上面有风景秀丽的岩石海岸线，还有文字“抓住机会，创造奇迹”。

sentence: It promotes the Adobe Creative Cloud Photography plan for USD 9.99 per month, featuring a "Join now" button.
sentence_cn: 它推广 Adob​​e Creative Cloud 摄影计划，价格为每月 9.99 美元，并带有“立即加入”按钮。

sentence: 2. Top Right: A bright image of a person with colorful hair and sunglasses.
sentence_cn: 2. 右上：一张明亮的图像，图像中的人物有着五颜六色的头发，戴着太阳镜。

sentence: The text offers "10 FREE ADOBE STOCK IMAGES" and encourages you to "Start now."
sentence_cn: 文中提供“10 张免费 ADOBE 库存图片”，并鼓励您“立即开始”。

sentence: 3. Center Left: An abstract image of a body covered in colorful paint.
sentence_cn: 3. 左中：一幅被五彩缤纷的油漆覆盖的身体抽象图像。

sentence: It offers "10 FREE ADOBE STOCK IMAGES" and mentions that the offer ends on November 30, with a "Get started" link.
sentence_cn: 它提供“10 张免费 ADOBE 图片”，并提到优惠将于 11 月 30 日结束，并附有“开始”链接。

sentence: 4. Bottom Left: Displays a landscape with a vibrant red tree.
sentence_cn: 4. 左下：显示一片拥有鲜红树木的风景。

sentence: It promotes the Adobe Creative Cloud's "entire collection of apps & services" starting at USD 49.99 per month with a "Join now" button.
sentence_cn: 它宣传 Adob​​e Creative Cloud 的“整个应用程序和服务集合”，起价为每月 49.99 美元，并带有“立即加入”按钮。

sentence: 5. Bottom Right: Features another view of the rocky coastline, similar to the top left, with the text "TAKE IT.
sentence_cn: 5. 右下：展示的是岩石海岸线的另一个景观，与左上角类似，并附有文字“拿去吧。

sentence: Promotes the Adobe Creative Cloud Photography plan with Lightroom and Photoshop for USD 9.99 per month and includes a "Join now" button.
sentence_cn: 推广包含 Lightroom 和 Photoshop 的 Adob​​e Creative Cloud 摄影计划，每月收费 9.99 美元，并包含“立即加入”按钮。

sentence: All images prominently display the Adobe logo in the top left corner.
sentence_cn: 所有图像的左上角均突出显示 Adob​​e 徽标。
